duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage construction projects, including facilities, structures, roadways, and infrastructure facilities.
Read and interpret contract language, make recommendations for contractor payments, and oversee project budgets.
Organize and manage project teams, supervise personnel, and make project staffing recommendations.
Analyze and interpret project plans and specifications, ensuring project constructability and overseeing contractor payment process.
Conduct meetings such as pre-construction, utility coordination, and construction progress meetings.
Review inspection data, resolve test discrepancies, and oversee document management for project records.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering or similar degree, specializing in construction/engineering management or equivalent experience (Master's preferred)
Current CCM or ability to obtain such within 6 months of hire
